scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development SERVER_COMMAND='npm run dev' docker compose up && zx ./scripts/hardhat.js
scripts.dev:update: NODE_ENV=development SERVER_COMMAND='npm run dev:update' docker compose up
scripts.dev:old: sudo service postgresql start & sleep 5 && NODE_ENV=development cd dapp && npm run dev & cd contracts && npx hardhat node & sleep 10 && cd contracts && npm run deploy:dev
scripts.posttdev: kill $(lsof -Pi | grep :8545 | awk '{ print $2}') & kill $(lsof -Pi | grep :3000 | awk '{ print $2}')
scripts.clean: kill $(lsof -Pi | grep :8545 | awk '{ print $2}') & kill $(lsof -Pi | grep :3000 | awk '{ print $2}')
scripts.postgres: [ ! -f .env ] || export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs) | sudo service postgresql start | $DATABASE_PASSWORD
